title.narrative: Providing assistance to the Libyan government in developing a national-level dialogue on the development of an effective security strategy.

description.narrative: To assist the Libyan government in developing a national-level dialogue on an effective security strategy. This project will directly benefit Libyan Government institutions, primarily the Ministries of Interior, Justice and Defence over three and a half years. The project will result in tangible improvements in security provision for Libyan citizens and will enhance the legitimacy of the Libyan Government, thus promoting the political stability.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
